      Associates the given Animation with the provided drawable state specs so that it will be run when the View's drawable state matches the specs.

    • Method Detail

      • addState

        public void addState(int[] specs,
                     android.animation.Animator animation,
                     android.animation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)
        Associates the given Animation with the provided drawable state specs so that it will be run when the View's drawable state matches the specs.
        Parameters:
        specs - drawable state specs to match against
        animation - The Animation to run when the specs match

      • setState

        public void setState(int[] state)
        Called by View

      • jumpToCurrentState

        public void jumpToCurrentState()
        If there is an animation running for a recent state change, ends it.

        This causes the animation to assign the end value(s) to the View.
